mapper.select: select s1.id, u.name, s1.user_id, s1.played, s1.favor, s1.name as song_name, s1.singer, s1.note From (select p.id, p.user_id, p.played, p.favor, s.name, s.singer, s.note from player p INNER JOIN song s on p.song_id = s.id where p.user_id = #{id} ) s1 INNER JOIN user u on s1.user_id = u.id
